title: Ennodu Nee Irundhaal  (Reprise) Lyrics I Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ennodu Nee Irundhaal
 (Reprise)
Singer: Sid Sriram, Chinmayi
Lyrics: Kabilan
Movie: I
Music:  AR Rahman
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Ennodu Nee Irundhaal
uyirodu naan iruppen
uyirodu naan iruppen

Ennodu Nee Irundhaal
uyirodu naan iruppen (repeat)

Unmai kadhal yarendraal
unai ennai solveney
neeyum  naanum poiendraal
kadhalai thedi kolveney

koondhal meesai ondraaga
oosi noolil thaippeney
thengaai neer pola
nenjil thaekki vaippeney.

Poovin kaambil pooththa
boomi pandhu naan
suthithi vazhven
unnai mattumthaan

un manadhai enadhaai
poththi paduppenn
udalil uyir pol
unnul kidappen.

Ennodu Nee Irundhaal

I tried my best :)
if you’re with me!!
I will live with soul

if you’re with me!!

who are true lovers?
I will tell you and me.
if we both are a lie
I’ll kill the “love”.

I’ll stitch your hair n my Mustache

will hold you in my heart

around you.

like a soul in a body.

if you’re with me.
